About Me

I'm Dafa Hentra, a highly motivated finance student based on Yogyakarta, Indonesia.

I'm passionate about analyzing data and crafting clear, insightful financial reports. I thrive on presenting complex numbers through clean, structured layouts that help stakeholders make confident decisions.

As a finance enthusiast, my work focuses on interpreting market trends and building models that offer transparency and precision—because clear financial insight drives smarter strategies and better outcomes.
